item.title: A Brave / Chrome extension to reorder new tabs
item.description: While browsing, I almost always keep three tabs open: Gmail, Slack, and Microsoft Teams (for work). I find it convenient to have them always in the same position (1, 2, and 3), so I can quickly switch to them using keyboard shortcuts (alt+1, alt+2, alt+3). While the â€¦
item.dc:creator: Giampaolo Rodola
